title: Daemon Dashboard TUI
body:
## Problem

`cortexd serve` currently runs as a headless process that streams logs to stdout. There is no visual interface for the daemon itself — users must use the separate `cortex kanban` CLI for per-project visibility.

## Solution

Replace raw log output with a bubbletea TUI dashboard that runs in the foreground while the HTTP API runs in a background goroutine. The dashboard shows all registered projects and their ticket stats at a glance.

### Layout

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  Cortex Dashboard                              Port: 4200  │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                             │
│  Projects                                                   │
│  ┌──────────────┬──────────┬──────┬────────┬─────────────┐  │
│  │ Project      │ Backlog  │ Prog │ Review │ Sessions    │  │
│  ├──────────────┼──────────┼──────┼────────┼─────────────┤  │
│  │ Cortex       │    3     │  1   │   0    │ 2 active    │  │
│  │ My App       │   12     │  2   │   1    │ 1 active    │  │
│  └──────────────┴──────────┴──────┴────────┴─────────────┘  │
│                                                             │
│  [enter] Project detail  [s] Spawn  [q] Quit                │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  ░░ Logs: POST /tickets 201 • SSE client connected • ...   │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Key behaviors

- Project table populated from the global project registry (`~/.cortex/settings.yaml`)
- Ticket counts fetched via StoreManager for each registered project
- Log footer streams recent daemon log lines (ring buffer)
- Real-time updates via SSE bus (ticket changes refresh counts)

## Dependencies

- Global Project Registry in settings.yaml (must be completed first)

## Scope

- New bubbletea TUI model in `internal/daemon/tui/` or similar
- Modify `cortexd serve` to run TUI in foreground, HTTP server in background goroutine
- Project table with ticket count columns (backlog, progress, review, done)
- Log footer with scrollable recent log output
- Keyboard navigation (vim keys, enter to drill down)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `cortexd serve` renders a TUI dashboard instead of raw logs
- [ ] Dashboard shows all registered projects with ticket counts
- [ ] Log output is captured and displayed in a footer pane
- [ ] HTTP API continues to function normally in the background
- [ ] Real-time updates when tickets change status
